name: Sakura Nova
description: Join Mikage, Kaguya, and Arisa as they train together, fight together and come together at a prestigious academy for young sexy aspiring knights. It’s an adventure of action, magic and humor!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: If you're familiar with any Sakura Games its not anything ground breaking. Longer Story, and the Choices actually depend on which ending you get (3 different endings).   18+ patch if you're looking for something like that.

First of all, the voice acting does an amazing job to give the game more life. Unlike other Sakura Games (those I have on my list) there are no voice acting and that makes the game a lot more fun, hopefully they continue with that in the future!  And the choices you have to make in some areas gives you somewhat different outcome, though I wish there was more areas you could actually choose different daiologs in. It's pretty lacking but it's still fun.  And who doesn't like Achievements and Steam trading Cards huh?!  More story in this than I imagined, pretty cliché though but it does the job and sometimes cliché is just fun, relaxing. And speaking of relaxing..   Would fap again 10/10!
I bought this just to ♥♥♥♥ off that one person on my FL who wishlists everything with anime tag.
No regrets. Just try it sometime.

loved it played it twice but getting the diffrent ending was hard becouse 9 queston only 2 paths are special and all other 510/512 are the same ending. but its great and   would highly recamened if your a fan of sakura games.
